about_the_game:
【About the game】

◆ Caution ◆
All in-game text has been translated using machine translation.

※Regarding External JSON Files
To supplement inaccurate machine translations, we have added JSON files. By modifying the text written in the JSON files, it is possible to incorporate the changes into the game. For more details, please refer to the _readme.txt file in the _translation folder.



◆ Story ◆
The protagonist, Yuma Kaneda, is a somewhat carefree salaryman. However, he has been swamped with work lately due to his colleagues leaving the company en masse. Seeing him gradually wearing out day by day, his boss gives him a free ticket to a certain massage parlor to help him refresh himself.
A few days later, he goes to the parlor for a breather, only to find out that it's actually a sensual esthetician that provides erotic services. After being satisfied with the services of a cast member named Maki whom he met there, he becomes addicted to her and starts visiting the parlor on his own, but...


【Character Introduction】


Name: Maki
Height: 160 cm
Three sizes: 103/64/98
Features: Bright, kind, and slightly sadistic?


【Voice Acting】
Maki: Honoka Yuuki
※Japanese voice recording (※male characters are not recorded)


◆ Game Specifications ◆
・Novel game that progresses with a click
・Heroine fully voiced
・CG mode
・Scene recollection


◆ Content Warning ◆
This game includes content that may not be suitable for all ages and may not be appropriate for display in the workplace.
The game contains nudity or sexual content, as well as general adult-oriented content.
All characters are over 18 years old.

name: Sexual Massage Shop - AKARI -

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
  • Additional Notes: Japanese language must be displayed and usable.

short_description: A story about finding solace in the time spent at a sexual service establishment. A tired salaryman recommended by a colleague visits a brothel where he finds comfort in the services provided by one of the cast embers. As they gradually become closer, they start to develop feelings for each other...
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
